response:
I ve got that you want to submit a new shipping address and you re unsure of the process  I m here to guide you through step by step 

1  Begin by logging in to your account 
2  Navigate to the  My Account  or  Profile  section 
3  Look for the  Shipping Addresses  or a similar tab 
4  Within that section  you should see an option to  Add a New Address  or  Edit Shipping Addresses   Select it 
5  Fill in the required details for your new shipping address  including the street name  city  state  ZIP code  and any other pertinent information 
6  Double check the accuracy of the entered information  ensuring that there are no typos or mistakes 
7  Once you ve reviewed the details and verified their correctness  save your changes 

If you encounter any difficulties or if the process varies on your specific platform  please provide additional information about the problem you re facing  and I ll be more than happy to assist you further
